sources.title: Rebecca of Sunnybrook Farm
sources.description: Title: Rebecca of Sunnybrook Farm Summary: With her family in financial difficulties, Rebecca is sent to live with her two strict, unfeeling aunts, who do not appreciate the young girl's charm and energy. Rebecca must make new ... Directed by: Marshall Neilan Actors: Production Company: Mary Pickford Company Release Date: 22 September 1917 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.33 : 1 With her family in financial difficulties, Rebecca is sent to live with her two strict, unfeeling aunts, who do not appreciate the young girl's charm and energy. Rebecca must make new friends and must adjust to surroundings that are sometimes difficult. But she still finds time to think of numerous ways to help others in her new hometown.

metadata.Plot: With her family in financial difficulties, Rebecca is sent to live with her two strict, unfeeling aunts, who do not appreciate the young girl's charm and energy. Rebecca must make new friends and must adjust to surroundings that are sometimes difficult. But she still finds time to think of numerous ways to help others in her new hometown.
metadata.Writer: Frances Marion, Charlotte Thompson, Kate Douglas Wiggin
metadata.Actors: Mary Pickford, Eugene O'Brien, Helen Jerome Eddy
